resources.string: This SOS button is for sending safety message to added contact numbers with pre-defined message in configured time duration.
This SOS button is for sending critical pre-defined message to added contact numbers and set time duration with current location.
This SOS button is for sending trouble (for help) with pre-defined message to added contact numbers and set time duration with current location and an email of recent recorded audio.

1. Add widget on home screen. 
2. Choose Mode. 
3. Set the message, contacts and time duration in setting page. 
4. Enable data for internet. 
5. Enable GPS.
